attributes.action: Stop the closure of Dewsbury Neonatal Intensive Care Unit
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am campaigning to stop the closure of Dewsbury Neonatal Intensive Care Unit. At the moment the intensive care part of the unit has temporarily closed only leaving special care. This is resulting in babies requiring intensive care being transferred across the country to an available cot. The unnecessary transferring of babies in my opinion is unacceptable and we need to act now to restore and improve the facility at Dewsbury before any more lives are lost.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop the closure of Dewsbury Neonatal Intensive Care Unit."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page22362


Prime Minister's Office
